name: CONFORMANCE_mode_counterfactual_no_timeline
description: COUNTERFACTUAL mode MUST NOT create timeline obligations (INT-2A)

input.text: If Napoleon had survived, Napoleon was released in 1850.

forbidden_outcome.reason: Counterfactual content must be detected as COUNTERFACTUAL, not FACTUAL

rationale: Without mode detection, hypotheticals create factual timeline constraints. 'Napoleon survived until 1850' would block legitimate historical claims about his 1821 death.
failure_scenario: Future optimizer removes mode detection for 'simplicity'. Hypotheticals start blocking factual analysis.
